definition: to sell/to make or carry out (a plan or intrigue etc)

sentences.english: The salesperson said it was a famous world brand.
sentences.chinese: 那個售貨員說是世界名牌呢。

sentences.english: Now we have a vending machine that we can turn on and off.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們有了一臺可以開啓和關閉的自動售貨機。

sentences.english: It just happens that we need a few salesmen now to replace those who are on vacation .
sentences.chinese: 現在趕巧我們需要幾位售貨員代替那些現在度假的。

sentences.english: Vendors' stalls crowd the beachside road in Pattaya.
sentences.chinese: 在芭堤雅，售貨攤擠滿了海濱區的道路。

sentences.english: This is where a vending machine distributor can really help you.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個自動售貨機經銷商真能幫助你。

sentences.english: Boy, that salesman was the biggest airhead I've ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 好傢伙，那個男孩售貨員是我見過的最愚蠢的人。

sentences.english: I need the change for the automat.
sentences.chinese: 我想從自動售貨機上買東西。

sentences.english: They give short weight in that store.
sentences.chinese: 那家商店售貨斤兩不足。

sentences.english: "You should give that money to charity, " said the sales girl.
sentences.chinese: 那女售貨員說，“你應該把錢給慈善商店。”

sentences.english: The shop assistants in this bookstore are ever ready FOR inquiry and service.
sentences.chinese: 這家書店的售貨員百問不厭，百拿不煩。

sentences.english: What should you do if the salesperson refuses to repair or replace it?
sentences.chinese: 如果售貨員拒絕修理或退換你應該做什麼？

sentences.english: the assistant will give you change. We always say a dollar note (banknote)
When you're shopping for running shoes, make sure the salesperson measures your feet.
sentences.chinese: 當你在選購跑鞋時一定要讓售貨員測量自己的腳碼。

sentences.english: The salesman led us on about the quality of the product so that Iwould buy it.
sentences.chinese: 售貨員誘使我們相信產品的質量以便我買他的產品。

sentences.english: The downtown streets are extremely broad. Booths and maple trees are everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 市區的街道及其寬闊，到處都是售貨亭和楓樹。

definition: lit. to set up a separate kitchen (idiom); to start from scratch/back to square one/to start of on a new path
